title: JAAL 1.1 node
description: A graph node in a JAAL recording. It is used to represent both nodes of rooted trees and generic graphs.

id.description: A unique identifier for the node among all data structures.

key.description: Reference to a data structure inside the node.

legend.description: A text to be displayed aside the node.

style.description: Graphical style of the node. TODO: ref to a Style schema

attr.description: A generic attribute of the node. TODO: ref to a Generic Attribute schema
